question_text: Did Alberta Ballet take any actions this reporting period that expanded its national or international presence?
If yes, what actions did we take (campaigns, partnerships, press, collaborations)?
What measurable outcomes did these actions generate (audience growth, media coverage, invitations, web or social spikes)?
If not, what prevented progress on expanding our presence this period?
Did we develop or advance any partnerships that enhance Alberta Ballet’s global brand this period?
If yes, who were the partners, what was the purpose of each partnership, and what stage are we at?
What outcomes or next steps are expected from these partnerships?
If not, were there potential partnership opportunities that we postponed or declined? Explain.
Did Alberta Ballet participate in any touring, showcases, or external appearances that support global presence this period?
If yes, where did we appear, what did we present, and who were the key audiences?
How did we leverage these appearances for recruitment, donor development, or brand visibility?
If not, were there opportunities we considered but did not pursue? Why?
Did you encounter any risks or barriers that limited Alberta Ballet’s global engagement this period?
If yes, what were the key barriers (capacity, cost, partners, timing) and what support would help address them?
Is there anything else leadership should know related to global presence this reporting period?
Did we implement or improve any digital tools or systems this reporting period?
If yes, which tools or systems changed and what problems were they intended to solve?
What early results or efficiencies have you observed from these changes?
If not, were any planned upgrades delayed or deferred? Why?
Did any digital changes this period improve internal workflows or reduce manual work?
If yes, which workflows improved and how (time saved, steps removed, reduced errors)?
If not, what workflow improvements are still most urgent?
Did we introduce or enhance any digital experiences for audiences, students, or donors this period?
If yes, what changed (e.g., online journeys, forms, portals, campaigns) and who was the target audience?
What early engagement or conversion results have you seen from these changes?
If not, what digital experience gaps remain the highest priority?
Did you encounter any digital challenges, outages, or security concerns this period?
If yes, describe the issue, its impact, and the status of resolution.
Is there anything else leadership should know regarding digital acceleration this reporting period?
Did you observe notable changes in staff morale or engagement this reporting period?
If yes, what did you observe and how is it affecting teams?
If not, are there any early warning signs or strengths worth noting?
Did any HR concerns arise this period that require leadership attention?
If yes, briefly describe the issue and your recommended next step.
If not, confirm there were no significant HR issues this period.
Did we provide any professional development, training, or leadership support this reporting period?
If yes, what activities occurred, how many staff participated, and what outcomes are emerging?
If not, what development or leadership support is most needed?
Did your area take any actions this period to strengthen team cohesion or workplace culture?
If yes, what actions did you take and what impact did you see?
If not, what culture-building efforts do you feel are still needed?
Did we advance any diversity, equity, or inclusion initiatives this reporting period?
If yes, what actions were taken and what outcomes or feedback have you observed?
If not, what barriers are limiting progress on DEI work?
Is there anything else leadership should know regarding talent, leadership, or staff culture?
Were there any governance items requiring action this reporting period?
If yes, what were the items and what actions were taken or are planned?
If not, confirm there were no governance items requiring action.
Did any Board or Board committee require additional staff support or coordination this period?
If yes, which Board body was involved, what support was needed, and what was the outcome?
If not, confirm that Board and committee work followed the standard cycle.
Are there any upcoming governance deadlines, reviews, or filings this period?
If yes, list each deadline, its due date, and current status.
If not, confirm there are no upcoming governance deadlines.
Were any compliance or governance risks identified this reporting period?
If yes, describe the risk, potential impact, and recommended mitigation.
If not, confirm there were no new governance or compliance risks identified.
Did the Board or leadership receive any reporting on organizational health (culture, DEI, staff engagement) this period?
If yes, what indicators were reviewed and what concerns or improvements were noted?
If not, are there areas of organizational health that should be brought forward for Board oversight?
Is there anything else leadership should know regarding governance or Board oversight this reporting period?
